title: Make Hyde Square Your New Home
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 634-677 Sq.
Hyde Square represents a new generation of modern, luxury apartments in Bellevue WA.
Clean, European styling, contemporary design and the kind of amenities typically found in the buildings across the water.
A home at Hyde Square puts you in the middle of what really matters in the Seattle area.

Full size, front-loading, stacked washers and dryers, Designer kitchen and bath plumbing fixtures, Stainless steel appliances, Tile tub surrounds, Modern, soft-close cabinetry, Solid-surface quartz countertops, Vaulted ceilings in all apartment homes, Wood/vinyl flooring throughout living areas, Available in most units, Private deck, patio or balcony, Tiled full-height kitchen backsplash

State-of-the-art fitness center, Luxurious landscaped courtyards, Pet spa and grooming area, Barbeque and fire pit areas, Wellness center with indoor sauna, Tavern-style bar room, Clubhouse & gourmet kitchen, Convenient package management, Business hub, Coffee lounge, Spin & yoga studio, Expansive private spa deck, Two sky lounges with rooftop access, Concierge services
Follow This Link for More Information:
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
